usage_rules.headings: Use Barlow Condensed for all H1-H3. Weight: 600 or 700. Tracking: tight (-0.02em).
usage_rules.body: Use Inter for all paragraphs and UI text. Weight: 400 or 500.
usage_rules.data: Use JetBrains Mono for Tracking IDs, Coordinates, and Financial Figures.
usage_rules.uppercase: Use uppercase + wide tracking (0.1em) for table headers and tiny labels.

accent.description: Use for Alerts, Pending Actions, 'Urgent' tags

rules: Never use gradients for backgrounds. Use solid, high-contrast colors.
Dashboard background should be 'surface' (#F8FAFC) to make white cards pop.
Text contrast must meet WCAG AA (4.5:1).

layout.spacing_system: Tailwind Scale (p-4, p-6, p-8). Use generous padding inside cards (p-6 minimum).

grid_system.dashboard: Bento Grid Mode B (High Density). Grid cols: 1 (mobile), 3 (tablet), 4 (desktop). Gap: 6.
grid_system.driver_app: Single column stack. Large touch targets (min height 48px).

general: Do not use generic centered layouts. Use asymmetric grids.
Avoid 'AI slop' aesthetics (generic gradients, rounded everything).
Ensure all interactive elements have 'data-testid' attributes.
accessibility: Focus states must be visible (ring-2 ring-primary).
Do not rely on color alone for status (use icons + text).
technical: Use 'export default function PageName' for pages.
Do not use 'transition: all'. Animate specific properties.
Do not use transparent backgrounds for dropdowns/modals (readability risk).

instructions_to_main_agent: You are building a high-performance logistics tool. Prioritize data density and clarity over decoration. Follow the 'Swiss & High-Contrast' archetype. Use the provided image URLs for visual context. Ensure the driver interface is touch-friendly (big buttons). Implement the 'Bento Grid' for the admin dashboard.
